subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Manu Ginóbili has played on Spurs teams that have won two N.B.A. titles and has a knack of throwing himself into the right place at the right time.
snippet: Manu Ginóbili has played on Spurs teams that have won two N.B.A. titles and has a knack of throwing himself into the right place at the right time.
